eventName: Where Vernal Winds Will Never Blow
storyInfo: As the Catastrophe approaches, Yumen soldiers and civilians come together to make final preparations. All eyes are on Huai Tianpei and Chongyue at the foot of the tower, as they begin a duel three years in making.

attributes.content: Hey, my bag! Don't push!
attributes.name: Anxious Civilian

attributes.content: There's plenty of time, folks. Don't panic, get in line, careful not to step on each other.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: Mama...
attributes.name: Panicked Child

attributes.content: I'm scared...
attributes.name: Panicked Child

attributes.content: Don't be scared, just hold my hand and stay close.
attributes.name: Mother

attributes.content: Where are we going?
attributes.name: Panicked Child

attributes.content: There's a big storm coming.
attributes.name: Mother

attributes.content: So we're going to a safe place where we won't be blown away.
attributes.name: Mother

attributes.content: Massive shadows begin rising from outside the walls, blocking out the sun.
The Four Guardians of Yumen, retractable external mobile barriers known as the Wind Aegis, designed by Tumu Tianshi and built by the military's Department of Smelting and Fabrication.
For centuries, Yumen has served as Yan's border bulwark, and the Wind Aegis have been her shield, protecting her from the sandstorms, winter winds and Originium storms of the great desert.
The Three Winds shall not pass as long as the Four Guardians stand.
Wow, it's so tall...
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: I've never seen the Wind Aegis deploy in all my three years in Yumen.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: Nothing to gape at.
attributes.name: Millenion

attributes.content: Yumen's walls are tall, and fully equipped with Originium defenses. Mundane Catastrophes rarely require the Wind Aegis to be deployed, but it's not entirely unheard of.
attributes.name: Millenion

attributes.content: However, this is the first time that we've had to move half the city's population, as far as I know...
attributes.name: Millenion

attributes.content: So, er, wh-what is the class of this Catastrophe? So big not even the Wind Aegis could hold it back?
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: The Wind Aegis lock into place, steel plates interlocked so tightly not even the wind can get through.
Long lines of civilians move away from the walls in the shadows that the Wind Aegis cast. Perhaps comforted by the sturdy presence of the barriers, the crowd calms down after some initial chaos.
The poplars that grow on the borderlands have grown used to the wind and sand.
What's the matter? Scared?
attributes.name: Millenion

attributes.content: Man your post. Don't think about anything else.
attributes.name: Millenion

attributes.content: Keep your eyes open. The Shanhaizhong are still in the city. Anything can happen with so many people moving about.
attributes.name: Millenion

attributes.content: Protect the commoners.
attributes.name: Millenion

attributes.content: You're still here?
attributes.name: Lungmen Agent

attributes.content: They've been broadcasting it all day. Yumen is about to run into a Catastrophe. Those on the east side need to move to shelters on the west side before noon.
attributes.name: Lungmen Agent

attributes.content: I know, I know. The Catastrophe cloud isn't here yet. I need to pack my things...
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: Here it is.
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: I could lose the tables, the chairs, even the building, but not this recipe book.
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: Say, you could come with me to Lungmen, if you lost the inn.
attributes.name: Lungmen Agent

attributes.content: Don't say that!
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: Sorry, yeah. That's bad luck.
attributes.name: Lungmen Agent

attributes.content: I just figured your culinary skills would do well in Lungmen too. I've had the chance to see you work up close these few days, after all.
attributes.name: Lungmen Agent

attributes.content: Nah, can't have that.
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: Where would the people of Yumen get my special sauteed meat if I left?
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: Are you a native of Yumen?
attributes.name: Lungmen Agent

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: I was born in the heartlands and went to Lungmen to seek my fortune. I came over when the cities linked, wanting to see what things were like in the north.
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: Then I lost my wallet and started working at this inn to make ends meet. Now I've been the innkeeper for years.
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: The building doesn't matter. Houses can be rebuilt.
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: Absolutely.
attributes.name: Lungmen Agent

attributes.content: Well, I'll help you back up.
attributes.name: Lungmen Agent

attributes.content: The winds are calm.
The dark, ominous mass of air is clearly visible, even from a distance, darkening part of the sky.
The Catastrophe does not seem to have moved, but the temperature is rising.
It is as though it is waiting for a gust of wind, before lashing out at the city walls.
Phew...
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Come to watch my brother's duel, General?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Catastrophe preparations are already done. The Grandmaster wants to see whether that one is worth his trust before the Catastrophe strikes. I can't miss this.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Still, it seems absurd to determine the sword's ownership in this way.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: You've been at my brother's side for decades. You would not trust his choice as a friend?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: ...Friend.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Hm.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: We have fought side-by-side, but we have never been brothers. Neither sword nor spear, nor gun nor cannon can harm your kind. How could you truly understand the camaraderie of man?
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: You remain outsiders to it all.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: 'Outsiders'?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: You could say that about me, but it seems unfair to apply it to my brother.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Man and beast are different. This has never changed.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: You know how the imperial court views your kind.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: An alliance can only endure when the two sides are equals. One should not wield power beyond one's control.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: I'm not in a position to trust him unconditionally, for I'm not his equal.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: I'm surprised you would be so frank.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: But perhaps you underestimate yourself...
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Zuo Xuanliao gazes wordlessly at the great desert beyond. The two shadows there are like two drops of ink on a great scroll.
Heaven and earth are silent.
It all feels like it happened yesterday.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: We partook in more than just war. We hunted, drank, and sang together. Yumen is still Yumen. Why is it that you have worries enough to turn your hair white?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Does the sight of those two remind you of those golden days?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: You say that man and beast are different, but look, a man has chosen to challenge this great barrier. Does your heart not race at a clash like that?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Loosen that brow of yours.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Care for a drink? We could even make a wager.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Good, good.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: You finally agreed to fight me.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Sorry for making you wait.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: It's only been three years. I could wait longer, if you have unfinished business.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Three years ago...
Hold it.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: That was just one exchange.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: It was enough.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: We traded three blows in that exchange. Someone could have been hurt, if we were using our full strength.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: But you're holding back, and I can't use my full strength either.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: That's no fun.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Sparring is about restraint...
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Screw sparring, screw restraint! Let's have a proper fight!
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: All the kung fu under Heaven evolved in the struggle of life and death. You're not talking like the top-ranked fighter on the Yumen Arena Board of Fame.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: You have a point. However...
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Fine, I know, you have a job to do. You're not in a position to go all-out.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: When are you quitting? We'll put this off until then.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Well, I have no idea when that might be.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Guesstimate it for me.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Could be three years, five, ten, maybe more.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Alright. I'll wait.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: You're right here, after all. I'm not worried you'll run away.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: There's always more to do. This is the right time and place for the fight that I owe you.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: I should explain that I have my own reasons for doing this.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: There's a tradition of military commanders sparring before their troops prior to a campaign, in order to inspire the men.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Yumen is about to fight a Catastrophe. This bout between you and I will inspire the warriors of the city.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Suits me just fine, as long as you're not worried about losing face when I make you eat dirt in front of the whole city.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Haha...
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: It's been many years since someone challenged me like this.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: It's been many years since I've seen someone worth challenging like you.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Ready to give me your all?
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Hold nothing back.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Victory and defeat lie in the hands of man.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Life and death lie in the hands of Heaven.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Did they start yet?!
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Hey, take it easy, you're injured.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: I'm a trained kung fu fighter. I'm not so fragile.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: There's plenty of time to rest later. Miss this fight, and I may never see one like it ever again!
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: It's not that big a deal...
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: The Feline is your dad, right? The good-for-nothing old man you were talking about?
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: I definitely see the resemblance. Like father, like daughter.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: In what way?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: The way you look before a fight.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Like you're gonna eat someone.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Hmph...
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: I hear the Grandmaster's skills are almost supernatural. He hasn't fought in public in years. Some even say that he invented half the kung fu under Heaven.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: And I hear your dad defeated that evil woman last night.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Who do you think will win here?
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Silly question. Of course you want your dad to win.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: That's his business, not mine.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: I just want to see for myself how big the gap between us is.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Mr. Liang...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I didn't think you would be interested in such violent business.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I ought to be here. As a friend.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: I wonder if he achieved his goal of making a name for himself.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Look at the number of eyes on this fight. It'll be the stuff of legend, no matter who wins.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: A lunatic must answer to himself before telling others who he is.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: We must all answer to ourselves.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: I was looking for Waai Tinp—Err, Huai Tianpei before trouble found me.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I went back to my old detective tricks and found out a few things. I have a good idea of what you're planning.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: There's probably a reason why trouble finds you.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: A big brother must look after his siblings.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: What did you hear?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Few know that the Grandmaster is Ling's eldest brother. Seems like it's being kept a secret.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: True...
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Retrieving the Grandmaster's sword is, of course, an urgent matter, but the bigger headache is what to do with it afterwards.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: You don't want it at Yumen. Perhaps you speak for the Sui Regulator, perhaps it's your judgment as advisor to Yumen, but the Lord Exorcist won't let it go.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: You needed someone who could take the sword, someone both sides can live with.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: You just happen to have an oath-brother who is a kung fu master, and he just happens to be in Yumen.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: It didn't take much effort to guide the girl to the clinic where Huai Tianpei worked, in order to ensure his involvement.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: From Shangshu to Yumen, you always get your old friends to solve your problems. Isn't that a little lazy?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I don't have many friends.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Question for you.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: When did you start thinking about getting Huai Tianpei involved?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Never mind, no need to tell me.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: *sigh*...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: No matter how many strings you pulled behind the scenes, it was always his lifelong wish to fight the best and become the best. He might even thank you for setting the stage, if he knew.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: We are all doing what we wanted to, even if things often don't turn out the way we want.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: After all these years, perhaps he's the one who's closest to his oldest dreams.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: 'Achieve one thing in life.' Easy for him to say...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Mr. Huai came, despite his injuries...
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: He would have come as long as there was a single breath left in him. He doesn't care if it's the last thing he does.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I know Mr. Huai came to Yumen to challenge the Grandmaster, and the Grandmaster accepted the challenge. The Grandmaster has spoken of it from time to time, and I can tell you that he's no less looking forward to this than Mr. Huai is.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: All kung fu fighters thirst for a good opponent.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: It's an obsession, a strange one. It's natural that you don't understand.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: It's the same reason that you follow the Grandmaster.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: You can actually be kind of astute at times, you know that?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I'll head down now.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: It's two masters at work. Nothing in your records will come close to what you are about to see.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I'll try to be detailed.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: Just keep your distance. You don't want to get hurt.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: Earlier that day...
Today's the day, isn't it?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Are you ready?
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: The veterans say Yumen has been through many crises in the past, but nothing on this scale.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Not even you know what's going to come of it, do you?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Things are more complicated than meets the eye.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: From Jiangqi to Yumen, how many times has she seen danger, seen her life hang by a thread?
Yet she did not die in the wilderness, nor did she become like the Shanhaizhong.
What is it that has kept her going?
This city has treated me well. I should do something for it.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Before that, however, I must answer to myself.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: You said that you would fight me whenever I felt up to it.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I did.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Strike me, if you're ready.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Qiubai takes a step back, focuses, and raises her sword.
She knows that he knows her every move like the back of his hand.
An eye for an eye.
Is there wisdom in the saying, or is it simply a result?
How many people have fed the fins by the river fort? Should their families seek revenge on her father?
How many people would seek revenge on her, if she killed this one in front of her for the sake of her own revenge?
The cycle of vengeance never ends.
Should it really be hate that keeps her going?
How long has she been thinking about that question? The five years that she has been around this man, seeing all that he saw?
No, longer than that.
Her sword has seen blood every step of the way from Jiangqi to Yumen. How would she judge those dead by it?
That is why she came to Yumen, for revenge, and to learn.
Exact what must be exacted, and discern what must be discerned.
The sword is pulled back abruptly.
It leaves her hand and falls into a nearby ditch, sending a pack of fowlbeasts scattering in all directions.
The violence of the move almost injures her, showing none of her usual grace in practice or battle.
Her expression, however, is one of satisfaction.
That will do.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: The sword has been thrust. It couldn't have killed you.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: ...Correct.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: I didn't let go of vengeance because I can't kill you, though.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: It's just not worth my sword anymore.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.text: When did she find the answer?

attributes.content: It seems you have made great strides in the past three years.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: We...
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: We've said too much.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: I just...
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Chongyue stops mid-sentence.
His opponent is injured. A few more words would give him time to adjust his breathing.
But he soon realizes that such kindness would be an insult to his opponent.
There is no such thing as a truly fair fight.
Cast away irrelevant thoughts, and give all for victory. That is what 'fair' is.
Let's begin.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Huai Tianpei clutches his fist, feeling the lines etched into his palm.
They are the marks of forty years of kung fu practice, his pride, his very emblem.
He's waited three years for this fight, but the preparation for it began on his first day studying kung fu.
A martial artist always aspires to the top.
The wind is still. The world is silent.
